name: I Expect You To Die (itch)
description:
--GAME SHOULD BE PLAYED IN FULLSCREEN MODE--

GMTK Game Jam Submission.

WASD - Move

Mouse - Aim

Left Click - Attack

R - Reload

Collect dice by defeating enemies in wave based combat and mix them together to create random weapons and powers.

Drag collected dice into the shaker, click the mix button and press repeatedly to mix together to create a weapon.

Music and SFX used:
